title: Coordinate Point Finder
description: Scientists need to identify coordinate points in research data. These points are written as two numbers separated by a comma, enclosed in parentheses. Help them find valid coordinate pairs like (12, 34) in their datasets.
solutionSummary: Uses escaped parentheses \( \) to match literal parentheses, \d+ for one or more digits, and literal comma with space. Demonstrates escaping special characters and basic quantifiers.
